title: Safe use of Comic Sans
content:
This is an ideal use for Vincent Connare’s marvellous creation.  
Photoshopped or “live”? It doesn’t matter. It’s very funny and  
that’s all that counts.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821154046im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/annoying_5077.jpg)

j a m e s
author: James Arboghast
